mapper.select: SELECT n.id, n.title, n.body, n.inserted, m.id memberId, m.nickName writerNickName FROM ManagerBoard n JOIN Member m ON n.memberId = m.id GROUP BY n.id ORDER BY n.id DESC
SELECT n.id, n.title, n.body, n.inserted, m.id memberId FROM ManagerBoard n JOIN Member m ON n.memberId = m.id WHERE n.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ManagerBoard (title, body, memberId) VALUES (#{title}, #{body}, #{memberId})
